channel.title: Windows on Tech notes and other stuff
channel.description: Recent content in Windows on Tech notes and other stuff

item.title: convert a bootable ISO-13346 (UDF) to ISO-9660
item.description: this is useful when you virtualbox is complaining about VBOX_E_IPRT_ERROR when using an iso file to install a guest OS(Windows 7) mkdir -p isos/mountp cp udfimage.iso isos cd isos geteltorito udfimage.iso &gt; boot.bin mount -o loop -t auto udfimage.iso mountp cp -r mountp udfimagecontents cp boot.bin udfimagecontents mkisofs -udf -b boot.bin -no-emul-boot -hide boot.bin -relaxed-filenames -joliet-long -D -o newimage.iso udfimagecontents reference: http://poppleit.com/how-to-edit-windows-7-install-dvd-extract-boot-image-and-create-iso-04-04-2011/

item.title: allow non-admin users to run programs to as administrator
item.description: use RunasSpc to allow non-admin users to run programs at elevated rights without your password. free for private use. link: http://www.robotronic.de/guidance.html
